column4: Hello World, I have an issue with my wireless connection in Ubuntu 8.10. My wireless card is working but I cannot see my own wireless router to connect to, but I can see my neighbours routers. The weird thing is that if I log into the Windows Partition on the laptop that Ubuntu is running on I can see my network. Any suggestions to help me out?
Can't pastebin it, I have no internet connection
have you tried clicking on network manager icon and selecting connect to hidden wireless networks and enter info
I've tried it now, I chosed WEP/128 passphrase , entered my passphrase got a prompt to enter the key, I did and it just tries to connect and gives me the prompt again
